messages.message: Are we planning to add an API to manage workspace permission. Kering (Gucci, Yves Saint Laurent, etc) would need to have more than 200 workspaces and will not be able to manager permissions manually. cc @Sanch

Right now we're currently planning on adding groups so that a company can auto-assign a group of users to workspaces. This won't be available via API though. It would be good to submit a new feature request for this @Léo so that we can track it for the future
